Row.Text: Internal Trade Routes produce +33% more [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Each [ICON_PUPPET] puppet connected via Internal Trade Route yields +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and an additional +5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith if following a different religion than your State Religion.
[TAB]{1_Num} from [ICON_SWAP] Trade Routes between your cities and your [ICON_PUPPET] puppets.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] from [ICON_SWAP] Trade Routes between your cities and your [ICON_PUPPET] puppets.

It is the charge of the Sultan to ensure that his reign is well regarded. And so we must commission a most decorated and elaborate Tughra to benefit the glory of our rule. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Ottomans. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free Great Artist. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates.

It is the charge of the Sultan to ensure that his reign is well regarded. And so we must commission a most decorated and elaborate Tughra to benefit the glory of our rule.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free Great Artist. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates.
